EmailTemplate.name: Customer Pickup
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good news, your custom logo YETI Coolers are ready to be picked up! You are welcome to pick them up Monday - Friday 8 AM - 5 PM at the following address. Please speak with Sam and reference the below sales order number.
Sales Order Number:
Order Complete (Y/N):
YETI Warehouse 3411 Hidalgo St Austin, TX 78702
We appreciate your custom logo order and enjoy your new YETIs!
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
